metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11464 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
A SIGFPE is raised in the function box_blur_line of rsvg-filter.c in GNOMElibrsvg 2.40.17 during an attempted parse of a crafted SVG file, because ofincorrect protection against division by zero.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11464` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-rsvg-2.0 - 2.40.13-3ubuntu0.1
librsvg2-2 - 2.40.13-3ubuntu0.1
librsvg2-bin - 2.40.13-3ubuntu0.1
librsvg2-common - 2.40.13-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librsvg package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.40.13-3ubuntu0.1').
